title: Scotland v New Zealand: All Blacks deny Scotland historic victory
description: New Zealand survive three yellow cards and a second-half onslaught from Scotland to win a thrilling Test 25-17 at Murrayfield.
content:
New Zealand survived three yellow cards and a second-half onslaught to maintain their unbeaten record against Scotland by edging a game for the ages at Murrayfield.
The visitors looked in complete control at the end of a first half that was book-ende... [3054 chars]

title: Protest held over Crowborough asylum seeker military site plan
description: Crowborough residents say they are concerned about potential safety impact in the town.
content:
Hundreds of people have attended a protest against plans to house asylum seekers at a military site in East Sussex.
The government recently announced that 600 people would be temporarily housed at a training camp on the outskirts of Crowborough.

title: Quentin Willson: Former Top Gear and Fifth Gear presenter dies aged 68
description: The presenter and campaigner was described by his family as a "true national treasure" and "true consumer champion".
content:
Former Top Gear presenter Quentin Willson has died aged 68 after a short illness.
Willson was a co-host on the BBC motoring show between 1991 and 2001 - working alongside the likes of Jeremy Clarkson - before going on to present Fifth Gear on Channel... [345 chars]

title: Scotland blow golden opportunity to beat All Blacks for first time
description: Scotland produced a great fightback and Finn Russell enacted his finest Braveheart impression by playing for most of the game on one-leg.
content:
Scotland return to action next Sunday as they welcome Argentina to Murrayfield, before hosting Tonga a week later.
New Zealand, meanwhile, face England next weekend before concluding their autumn campaign with a trip to Wales.

title: Full Moon November 2025: When To See The Biggest Supermoon Since 2019
description: Everything you need to know about November’s full beaver “supermoon” — the year’s largest full moon — with exactly when, where and how to see it at its best.
content:
Topline
The full beaver moon — the second of fall in the Northern Hemisphere — will turn full on Wednesday, Nov. 5, but it will be best seen from North America during dusk on Thursday, Nov. 6. Named for the beavers that build their dams at night in N... [547 chars]
